name: passenger car production, electric, without battery | passenger car, electric, without battery | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7012/documentation

This dataset describes the production of an electric passenger car without its battery. The entries are based on a per kg basis. The model is optimized for a vehicle of about 1200kg including the battery. It is subdivided in two modules, the glider and the drivetrain. Each module contains the specific materialization and production efforts and emissions. The specific end of life treatment of each module is covered in the respective dataset. The dataset includes the manual dismantling of the car  at the end of its life and the waste fractions deriving from this process. The battery of the vehicle is in the respective transport dataset.

The datset takes as input the two modules (glider and drivetrain) which build the vehicle without battery. The production efforts, emissions and manufacturing infrastructure are in the respective modules. The dataset also includes the manual dismantling of the vehicle at the end of its lifetime.

The activity ends with the assembly of the car without battery and returns the waste fractions from the dismantling.
category: C:Manufacturing/29:Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers/291:Manufacture of motor vehicles/2910:Manufacture of motor vehicles

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The dataset is based on averages over passenger car technologies spanning from 2000 to 2010 which are  expected to be representative up to 2015.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The data is expected to be representative up to 2015 since no substantial changes could be observed in the materialisation of passenenger cars between 2000 and 2010. It is not expected that major changes will occur until 2015 in commercially available passenger cars.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Average of material compositions published in literature between 2000 and 2010.

exchanges.description: Estimate based on currently produced electric vehicles.

flow.name: passenger car, electric, without battery
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/29:Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers/291:Manufacture of motor vehicles/2910:Manufacture of motor vehicles

exchanges.description: Glass contributions from the manual dismantling of the car. Information on the materialisation of the dismatled vehicle are in Habermacher 2010. The waste fractions per kg are calculated without considering the weight of the battery.

flow.name: waste glass
